entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 50 late this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
